item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on a classic group trip to ancient Morocco!

Join your fellow club members March 31 - April 7, 2012 on this exciting group trip to Morocco - Casablanca, Fez & Marrakech! Explore the wonders and beauty of ancient Morocco, as we travel the storied route from exciting Casablanca, through Fez and Marrakech, all along visiting beautiful palaces, fabled towns, bustling ancient markets, and viewing the amazing Atlas Mountains... all in 4 star comfort.

This group trip is an awesome way to experience the beauty, history, sights and excitement of Morocco with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $1,799, pp plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this exciting adventure:
* 8 Days, 7 Nights in Moroccan 4 to 5 star hotels
* Expert Local guide throughout
* Global Expeditions Club Trip Leader
* Guided tour of Casablanca
* Guided tour of Fez
* Guided tour of Marrakech
* Transportation in modern A/C vehicles
* Visit and shopping in traditional local souk markets
* Breakfast daily

Places Visited: Morocco Group Tour, Casablanca, Rabat, Fez, Marrakech, Immouzzer du Kandar, Ifrane, Beni Mellal, Meknes, Volubilis

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 15,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: Morocco: Classic Group Tour - 8 Days
